description:
Works with 8-speed Shimano® compatible freehub bodies, and delivers easy shifting for your road bike.

  • Sprockets made from steel for long lasting durability
  • For use with a 6/7/8-speed chain only. Not compatible with 9-speed or 10-speed chains
  • Tooth count is 12, 13, 15, 17, 19, 21, 23, 25
  • Sandblasted satin finish for low maintenance
name: SunRace R86 8 Speed 12-25T Cassette
